methods.description: Return more details about a list of products.

parameters.name: ids
parameters.description: Comma separated list of product ids

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Query string to search for items.

parameters.name: priceMin
parameters.description: The minimum price to filter by.

parameters.name: priceMax
parameters.description: The maximum price to filter by.

parameters.name: similarToId
parameters.description: A product id that you want to find similar products for. (Only include one)

parameters.name: numResults
parameters.description: How many results to return. Defaults to 5. It can be a number between 1 and 10.

apiDescription: Search for millions of products from the world's greatest brands.
